source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers Accidental Death, Permanent Disablement and Third Degree Burns.

Coverage includes amateur sports like tandem skydiving, hang-gliding, paragliding, snow-skiing, hot-air ballooning, bungee jumping, indoor rock climbing and trekking up to 3,500m above sea level for all mountains.

base_limits.type: Treatment by Physiotherapist, Chinese Physician or Chiropractor

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers outpatient and hospitalisation medical expenses incurred overseas arising from accident or sickness, emergency dental expenses arising from accident, and accidental miscarriage. Cashless services available at 740 clinics and hospitals in Japan.
Includes 24-Hour Medical Assistance via Emergency Assistance Japan (EAJ) Hotline (+81-3-3811-8212) for appointment arrangement and cashless treatment in Japan.

Coverage includes medical expenses arising from amateur sports like tandem skydiving, hang-gliding, paragliding, snow-skiing, hot-air ballooning, bungee jumping, indoor rock climbing and trekking up to 3,500m above sea level for all mountains.

coverages.coverage_name: Medical Expenses Incurred Upon Return to Singapore

base_limits.type: Treatment by Physiotherapist, Chinese Physician or Chiropractor

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers follow-up treatment within 31 days from return date. If initial treatment was not sought overseas, treatment in Singapore must be sought within 48 hours from return date and covered for up to 31 days.

coverages.coverage_name: Emergency Medical Evacuation & Repatriation (Including Mortal Remains) Back to Singapore

base_limits.type: Per Insured Person - up to 70 years
Per Insured Person - up to 70 years (Pre-existing Conditions)
Per Insured Person - above 70 years (Pre-existing Conditions)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Includes pregnancy-related complications and pre-existing medical conditions.
source_specific_details.source_location: Page 3, Section 4 & Page 2, Medical Evacuation & Repatriation

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Payable for each complete day you are hospitalised overseas.

coverages.coverage_name: Double Hospitalisation Allowance Whilst Overseas in ICU Arising from an Accident

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Payable for each complete day you are in ICU overseas due to an accident. This benefit is payable in lieu of the Overseas Hospitalisation Allowance (Section 5).

coverages.coverage_name: Hospital Allowance for Hospitalisation in Singapore

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Payable for each complete day you are hospitalised in Singapore following your trip.
Covers expenses incurred on written medical advice by a qualified medical practitioner as a result of your accident or sickness during the trip.

coverages.coverage_name: Guardian for Return of Dependent Children

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Pays for one relative or friend to travel and accompany your unattended dependent child(ren) home in the event of your hospitalisation overseas.

coverages.coverage_name: Compassionate Visit by a Relative or Friend

base_limits.type: Per Insured Person - Due to your injury, sickness or disease
Per Family - Due to your injury, sickness or disease
Per Insured Person - In the event of your death
Per Family - In the event of your death

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers travel and accommodation expenses for one relative or friend to visit you if you are hospitalised overseas due to injury/sickness/disease, or to assist in arrangements in the event of your death.

coverages.coverage_name: Loss or Damage to Baggage & Personal Effects

base_limits.type: Any one article or pair or set of articles
Video equipment, camera, batteries and lenses (per article)
Laptop computer including accessories or tablet device (either one)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers loss or damage to your baggage and personal effects during the trip. Sub-limits apply as specified under Section (B) limits.

base_limits.type: Loss of money resulting from theft
Fraudulent use of credit card overseas

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers loss of essential travel documents and money. Sub-limits apply as specified under Section (E) limits.

Covers non-refundable travel expenses if trip is cancelled or postponed due to Insured Events occurring within 30 days before departure. Includes coverage for loss of frequent flyer or similar travel points used to purchase an airline ticket.
source_specific_details.source_location: Page 4, Section 13 & Page 2, Trip Cancellation or Postponement

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers the loss of un-utilised portion of prepaid travel costs and expenses after trip departure, arising from Insured Events resulting in your necessary return to Singapore.

base_limits.type: Per Insured Person - Loss of un-utilised prepaid costs/expenses
Per Family - Loss of un-utilised prepaid costs/expenses
Per Insured Person - Cash benefit for un-utilised paid ticket cancellation

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers loss of un-utilised portion of prepaid travel costs and expenses whilst overseas due to Insured Events. Also pays a cash benefit for cancellation of pre-paid tickets for events due to Insured Events.
source_specific_details.source_location: Page 4, Section 15 & Page 1/2 Trip Disruption Cover

coverages.coverage_name: Financial Collapse of Licensed Tour Operators

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers loss of non-refundable or un-utilised prepaid travel costs and expenses for trip cancellation or curtailment occurring after the date of policy issue due to the financial collapse of the licensed tour operator.
Covers legal liability for accidental injury to third parties or accidental damage to third party property.
Payable for delay in arrival of checked-in baggage. Extended to cover delay as a result of your baggage being wrongly picked up at the bag carousel by another passenger whilst overseas.

Payable for delay of scheduled public conveyance due to any cause outside your control. Payout based on the difference between actual arrival time and original scheduled arrival time. Covers all causes of unexpected delays beyond control.
source_specific_details.source_location: Page 4, Section 19 & Page 1/2 Travel Delay For All Risks

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Payable if you are denied boarding on a confirmed scheduled flight whilst overseas due to overbooking and no alternative transport is provided within 6 hours.

Payable for delay upon arrival at destination due to flight deviation caused by (a) adverse weather conditions; or (b) landing at an alternative destination for emergency medical treatment of a fellow passenger.
Payable for delay caused by the hijacking of the public conveyance you are travelling in.
Payable if pre-booked hotel facilities (e.g., swimming pool, gym) are unavailable due to breakdown or damage.
Payable if you miss a connecting scheduled public conveyance due to the late arrival of your incoming conveyance, and no alternative is available within 6 hours.
Payable for each full 48 hours you are held captive due to kidnapping during your trip.

base_limits.type: Per Insured Person (Aggregate Limit for applicable sections)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Provides cover for losses arising from acts of terrorism, up to an aggregate limit across the applicable sections of the policy.
Provides Personal Accident cover (Section 1 limits apply) if you suffer Accidental Death or Permanent Disablement as an innocent bystander due to war.

base_limits.type: Per Insured Person (Aggregate Limit for applicable sections)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Provides cover for accidental injury or medical expenses related to leisure underwater activities (e.g., scuba diving, likely subject to standard policy conditions like certification/supervision). Aggregate limit applies across relevant sections.
Covers additional costs for alternative accommodation if your pre-booked accommodation is cancelled after the trip has commenced due to unforeseen events.
Covers additional costs for alternative travel arrangements if your scheduled transport is cancelled or significantly delayed due to unforeseen events after the trip has commenced.
Reimburses emergency phone call charges incurred due to an insured event (e.g., contacting emergency assistance, reporting loss).
Covers the insurance excess you are liable to pay if your rental vehicle is damaged or stolen.
Covers costs for necessary reconstructive surgery, including skin transplantation, due to accidental burns sustained during the trip.

coverages.coverage_name: Recuperation Allowance Due to Accidental Miscarriage

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Provides a lump sum allowance if you suffer an accidental miscarriage during the trip.

coverages.coverage_name: Quarantine Allowance Due to 17 Infectious Diseases Upon Return to Singapore

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Payable if you are quarantined in Singapore upon return due to being diagnosed with one of the 17 specified infectious diseases (SARS, Dengue, vCJD, Nipah, Japanese Encephalitis, Malaria, TB, Measles, Rabies, Melioidosis, HFMD, Avian Flu (H1N1, H5N1, H9N2, H7N7, H7N9), Chikungunya, Mumps, Rubella, MERS, Zika).

base_limits.type: Loss or damage of golf equipment

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers loss or damage to your golf equipment during the trip. Hole-in-one, unused green fees, and damage to buggy are not covered under the GO Japan! plan.

coverages.coverage_name: Free and Automatic Extension of Policy

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Policy coverage is automatically extended for up to 14 days if your return to Singapore is delayed beyond the policy end date due to injury, illness, quarantine, or delayed/cancellation of public conveyance.
source_specific_details.source_location: Page 2, Free and Automatic Extension of Policy
